content: Man, I saw some awful 1970’s Italian ‘giallo’ movies in college. They were entertaining in a perverse way, not really scary, not really gory, easy to take when combined with tall plastic containers of beer. Several gorgeous women in those movies. I can’t remember their names, but I think Asia Argento is a real stretch to call a close second, maybe 52nd ! Don’t stop at a 2012 flick, embrace the span of cinematic time!
